<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Lekmek](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2167)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 57</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9, [Mining Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +0

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Greatpick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=23), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 56

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greatpick +11 ([fatal d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=178)),
**Damage** 1d10+6 piercing

**Bark Command** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Requirements** Lekmek hasn't attempted a Strike on this turn yet; **Effect** Lekmek barks a command to a lower-level kobold within 30 feet. That kobold can immediately take a Stride or Strike action.

**False Retreat** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** Lekmek is adjacent to at least one enemy; **Effect** Lekmek Strides, as if he were attempting to run away but is actually attempting to open a foe up for an attack. If Lekmek's Stride triggers a reaction, he can attempt a greatpick Strike (using his highest attack modifier) on the creature that takes this reaction. If he does so, Lekmek gains a +1 circumstance bonus on his attack roll.

</column>
